name: Mutant Factions
description: Mutant Factions is a fast-paced and tactical online shooter. You play as a mutant in the city of Subvein, where the only way to grow stronger is to destroy anyone who opposes you! You will mutate as you kill your enemies, giving you skill points that you can invest into a huge selection of unique and crazy skills. There are over 30 weapons and vehicles to choose from and a variety of fun game modes to play such as Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Checkpoint Racing and Zombie Survival! Download and play Mutant Factions now - it takes mere minutes to download and best of all it's 100% FREE!
